languages.text: "Так про меня говорят, да. А про тебя говорят, что ты — надышавшаяся дурманом маньячка, морящая людей развлечения ради".
"Yes, that's what they say about me. And what they say about you is that you're an obscura-huffing maniac who kills people for sport."
languages.original_text: "Так про меня говорят, да. А про тебя говорят, что ты — надышавшаяся дурманом маньячка, морящая людей развлечения ради".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, that's what they say about me. And what they say about you is that you're a dope-sniffing maniac who kills people for sport."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Yes, that's what they say about me. And what they say about you is that you're a dope-sniffing maniac who kills people for sport."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Yes, that's what they say about me. And what they say about you is that you're a dope-sniffing maniac who kills people for sport."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Yes, that's what they say about me. And what they say about you is that you're a dope-sniffing maniac who kills people for sport."

traits.locale_text: "Yes, that's what they say about me. And what they say about you is that you're an obscura-huffing maniac who kills people for sport."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Yes, that's what they say about me. And what they say about you is that you're an obscura-huffing maniac who kills people for sport."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “没错，他们就是这么说我的。他们还说，你是个嗑嗨了的疯婆子，杀人只是为了娱乐。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, that's what they say about me. And what they say about you is that you're an obscura-huffing maniac who kills people for sport."

traits.locale_text: “没错，他们就是这么说我的。他们还说，你是个吸嗨了的疯婆子，杀人只是为了娱乐。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「そうだ。私はそう言われている。そして君は、スポーツの一環として人を殺す、オブスキュラ中毒の狂人だと言われている」
languages.original_text: "Yes, that's what they say about me. And what they say about you is that you're an obscura-huffing maniac who kills people for sport."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ。私はそう言われている。そして君は、スポーツの一環として人を殺す、オブスキュラ中毒の狂人だと言われている」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Sí, eso dicen las malas lenguas. ¿Y sabes lo que dicen de usted? Que es una adicta a la obscura que ha perdido la cabeza y que mata a gente porque sí».
languages.original_text: "Yes, that's what they say about me. And what they say about you is that you're an obscura-huffing maniac who kills people for sport."

traits.locale_text: «Sí, eso dicen las lenguas. ¿Y sabes lo que dicen de usted? Que es una drogadicta que ha perdido la cabeza y que mata a gente porque sí».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ja, das sagt man über mich. Und über Euch sagt man, dass Ihr eine obscura-schnüffelnde Wahnsinnige seid, die aus purem Vergnügen Menschen tötet."
languages.original_text: "Yes, that's what they say about me. And what they say about you is that you're an obscura-huffing maniac who kills people for sport."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, das sagt man über mich. Und über Euch sagt man, dass Ihr eine drogensüchtige Wahnsinnige seid, die aus purem Vergnügen Menschen tötet."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Oui, c'est effectivement ce que l'on dit de moi. Quant à vous, vous êtes une toxicomane démente accroc à l'obscura qui tue des gens pour le plaisir. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, that's what they say about me. And what they say about you is that you're an obscura-huffing maniac who kills people for sport."

traits.locale_text: « Oui, c'est effectivement ce que l'on dit de moi. Quant à vous, vous êtes une toxicomane démente qui tue des gens pour le plaisir. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Evet, benim hakkımda bunları söylüyorlar. Senin hakkında söyledikleri şey ise insanları spor olsun diye öldüren, obsküra çeken bir manyak olduğun."
languages.original_text: "Yes, that's what they say about me. And what they say about you is that you're an obscura-huffing maniac who kills people for sport."

traits.locale_text: "Evet, benim hakkımda bunları söylüyorlar. Senin hakkında söyledikleri şey ise, insanları spor olsun diye öldüren, obsküra çeken bir manyak olduğun."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
